modsync.urlField.tooltip: The URL of the sync configuration file
modsync.syncUrlIsNotWorking: The configured sync URL is not working.
modsync.syncUrlIsWorking: The configured sync URL is working.
modsync.testButton.tooltip: Click to test if the sync URL is working
modsync.actionButton.install.tooltip: Automatically installs new files when they are available.
modsync.actionButton.prompt.tooltip: Shows a dialog and asks for confirmation before installing or removing files.
modsync.actionButton.ignore.tooltip: Turns off syncing. No files will be downloaded or removed.
